block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Get Latest Package Version

input.code:
latest_version = ""
deployment_comments = ""
execution_reference = ""

deployment_details = input['deployment_details']
latest_deployment = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil).sort_by {|x| (x[:deployed_on].to_time)}.last

if latest_deployment.present?
  latest_version = latest_deployment[:package_version]
  deployment_comments = latest_deployment[:deployment_comments]
  execution_reference = latest_deployment[:execution_reference]
end

{ latest_package_version: latest_version,
  deployment_comments: deployment_comments,
  execution_reference: execution_reference }
input.name: Get Latest Package Version

extended_input_schema.empty_schema_title: Add variables by giving them a name, type and default value
extended_input_schema.label: Variables
extended_input_schema.name: variables

properties.label: Production Environment
properties.name: production_environment
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Calculate Final Version

input.code:
# @param input [Hash] input hash supplied in the recipe step
# @return value returned in the last line
# Eg: Code for returning country code for an IP address
# {
#   country_code: get("http://freegeoip.net/json/" + input["ip_address"])
# }

latest_package_version = input['latest_package_version']
version = input['version']
latest_package_version_arr = latest_package_version.split('.').map do |x| 
  x&.to_i
end

case version
  when 'major'
  	latest_package_version_arr[0] = latest_package_version_arr[0] + 1
  	latest_package_version_arr[1] = 0
  	latest_package_version_arr[2] = 0
  when 'minor'
  	latest_package_version_arr[1] = latest_package_version_arr[1] + 1
	latest_package_version_arr[2] = 0
  when 'bugfix'
	latest_package_version_arr[2] = latest_package_version_arr[2] + 1
  else
	latest_package_version_arr
end

{
  final_package_version: latest_package_version_arr.join(".")
}
input.name: Calculate Final Version
